channel.title: Monster drop help
channel.description: This is what Xero put in Testscape source but i dunno how to get the index id plz help me [code]this is index number in autospawn cfg, not actual npc id, if using more than 1 of the desired npc use more than one index - cheez[/code]

item.title: Monster drop help
item.dc:creator: @david5646 david5646
item.description:
@david5646 wrote:

This is what Xero put in Testscape source but i dunno how to get the index id plz help me

this is index number in autospawn cfg, not actual npc id, if using more than 1 of the desired npc use more than one index - cheez

Read full topic
